mapper.select: SELECT lc.`type` , sum(lc.`minute`) AS total_minute FROM life_color lc WHERE lc.do_date > date_sub(now(), interval 1 year) GROUP BY lc.`type`

SELECT group_name AS name, COUNT(*) as value from (SELECT CASE WHEN (lc.time_point <= '22:00:00' and lc.time_point > '12:00:00') THEN '<10' WHEN (lc.time_point <= '23:00:00' and lc.time_point > '22:00:00') THEN '10-11' WHEN (lc.time_point <= '23:30:00' and lc.time_point > '23:00:00') THEN '11-11.5' WHEN (lc.time_point <= '24:00:00' and lc.time_point > '23:30:00') THEN '11.5-12' WHEN (lc.time_point <= '01:00:00' and lc.time_point > '00:00:00') THEN '12-1' ELSE '>1' END AS group_name FROM life_color lc where lc.`type` = 'S' and lc.time_point is not null and lc.do_date > date_sub(now(), interval 1 year)) a GROUP BY a.group_name;
